scenarios.title: Architecture Discussion - Vector DB
scenarios.description: Tests: Technical discussion with budget/roadmap implications

messages.text: Been researching vector databases for the semantic search feature. Pinecone vs Weaviate vs pgvector - thoughts?
pgvector would be simplest since we're already on Postgres. But Pinecone has better performance at scale
True. We're looking at ~10M vectors initially. Pinecone's free tier won't cut it
@Kyle This affects our Q4 roadmap and budget. Can you put together a comparison doc with cost projections?
